remarks: Properties that determine a group operation.  Read ` N ` as ` N ( x ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isgrpi.1 $e |- X e. _V $.
isgrpi.2 $e |- G : ( X X. X ) --> X $.
isgrpi.3 $e |- ( ( x e. X /\ y e. X /\ z e. X ) -> ( ( x G y ) G z ) = ( x G ( y G z ) ) ) $.
isgrpi.4 $e |- U e. X $.
isgrpi.5 $e |- ( x e. X -> ( U G x ) = x ) $.
isgrpi.6 $e |- ( x e. X -> N e. X ) $.
isgrpi.7 $e |- ( x e. X -> ( N G x ) = U ) $.
isgrpoi $p |- G e. GrpOp $.
$d G x y z $.
$d N y $.
$d U x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
